issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: Query Processor
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with query processing.

OK

OK

{code}
fields.summary: ALTER TABLE ADD PARTITION can't handle partition key names that conflict with HQL keywords

comments.body: This problem is not limited to keywords.  The error appears to be that you can't use `` marks in ALTER TABLE ... ADD PARTITION (`...`='...');  This is easily worked around in any non-keyword case but unexpected behavior since column names are normally quoted with `.
2 years - what's going on with this?
